column4: hi, edgy install always locks my system completly down in the same place: 87% setting clock. The hardware is new Asus P5B with Core duos. Anyone have an idea?
is your bios up to date?
there's another quick and dirty thing you could do, and you might break a lot of stuff, but if that's coming from scripts in /etc/rc.whatever
you could just comment stuff about setting clock
